name: Fast Sight
description:
Fast Sight is a fun solo/1V1 asymetrical runner game where you use your eyes to pick up buffs or delete terrain to get farther and farther in the game. Player1 has to reach as fast as possible Player2 !

(special download with MOUSE SUPPORT)
